page.title: 04FARMING
page.content:
49% OF OUR AREA IS FARMLAND. THE CROPS WHICH TAKE UP THE MOST SPACE ARE THE CEREALS AND THE OILSEED RAPE. THE TYPES OF CEREAL ARE BARLEY AND WHEAT (YOU CAN TELL THE DIFFERENCE BECAUSE BARLEY DROOPS). THERE IS ONLY A SMALL AMOUNT OF PIG, BEEF AND POULTRY PRODUCTION. THE ONLY KIND OF POULTRY ARE CHICKENS. THERE IS QUITE A BIT OF FRUIT GROWING (APPLES, PEARS). THERE IS SOME MARKET GARDENING (LETTUCES, BEETROOT, ONIONS,BROCOLLI, CABBAGE AND RUNNER BEANS). THE AREA COVERED BY HAYFIELDS, POULTRY AND PIG PRODUCTION ETC.IS VERY SMALL.
THE DAIRY CATTLE IN THE AREA ARE FRESIAN AND JERSEY AND THERE IS A SMALL AMOUNT OF GRASSLAND.
